quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don't wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: You may delay, but time will not.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don’t be fooled by the calendar. There are only as many days in the year as you make use of.
author: Charles Richards

quote: The essence of time management is to organize your time and yourself.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: It's not enough to be busy, so are the ants. The question is, what are we busy about?
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Ordinary people think merely of spending time, great people think of using it.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: He who every morning plans his day, and follows out that plan, carries a thread that will guide him through the labyrinth of the most busy life.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
author: Unknown

quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The less I have to do, the less time I have to do it in.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Focus on being productive, not busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Efficiency is doing things right. Effectiveness is doing the right things.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: The productivity guru who doesn’t take a break is the one who will eventually break down.
author: Unknown

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
author: William James

quote: Most of us spend too much time on what is urgent and not enough time on what is important.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Work-life balance is not a myth. It's a choice you make every day.
author: Unknown

quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: To think is easy. To act is difficult. To act as one thinks is the most difficult of all.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: You can’t make up for lost time. You can only do better in the future.
author: Unknown

quote: The more time you waste, the more you will regret.
author: Unknown

quote: Take care of the minutes and the hours will take care of themselves.
author: Lord Chesterfield

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.'
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, or ever seriously consider them as believable or achievable. Winners can tell you where they are going, what they plan to do along the way, and who will be sharing the adventure with them.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The shortest way to do many things is to do only one thing at a time.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: If you want to make an easy job seem hard, just keep putting off doing it.
author: Olin Miller

quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The surest way to be late is to have plenty of time.
author: Leo Kennedy

quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: The difference between successful people and very successful people is that very successful people say 'no' to almost everything.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We are always complaining that our days are few, and acting as though there would be no end to them.
author: Seneca

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you genuinely want something, don’t wait for it—teach yourself to be impatient.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Develop an 'attitude of gratitude.' Say thank you to everyone you meet for everything they do for you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
author: Anatole France

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: To conquer without risk is to triumph without glory.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: It's not about having time. It's about making time.
author: Unknown
